robotics.title: Automatic Optical Fiber Inspection with UR5
robotics.description: Engineered a robotic vision system integrating UR5 collaborative robot with deep learning-based anomaly detection to identify microscopic dust particles (15–25µm) on optical fiber connectors. Achieved 98% detection accuracy with sub-second processing time, reducing manual inspection costs by 85%.

robotics.title: Automated PCB Inspection System (VLM + ResNet + PatchVORE)
robotics.description: Designed an advanced AOI system combining Vision-Language Models with ResNet and PatchVORE architecture for multi-defect PCB inspection. Implemented zero-shot defect classification using VLMs, achieving 95%+ accuracy across 12 defect categories without fine-tuning.

robotics.title: Interactive Face-Tracking Robot with Real-Time Vision
robotics.description: Built an engaging robotic system featuring real-time face detection, tracking, and emotion recognition. Integrated servo control with computer vision pipeline for natural head movements and human interaction. Optimized for edge deployment with <100ms latency.

robotics.title: Multi-Camera 3D Object Tracking for Robotics
robotics.description: Developed a multi-camera system for 3D object tracking and pose estimation in robotic manipulation tasks. Implemented SLAM and visual odometry for accurate spatial awareness. System enables robots to track and grasp objects in dynamic environments with 95% success rate.

llmops.title: LLM-Powered RAG Chatbot for Enterprise FOB Escalation
llmops.description: Developed and deployed a production-grade RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) chatbot with intelligent decision-making for Front-of-Building ticket escalation. Implemented LLMOps pipeline with monitoring, version control, and A/B testing. Reduced escalation response time by 60% and improved accuracy to 92%.

llmops.title: LLM Fine-Tuning & Deployment Pipeline
llmops.description: Built end-to-end LLMOps pipeline for fine-tuning and deploying custom language models. Implemented automated evaluation, prompt versioning, cost optimization, and observability. Reduced inference costs by 40% while maintaining performance through quantization and efficient serving strategies.

papers.title: Deep Learning-Based Microscopic Defect Detection in Optical Fiber Manufacturing
papers.venue: IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA)
papers.abstract: We present a novel deep learning framework for detecting microscopic defects (15-25µm) in optical fiber connectors using robotic vision systems. Our approach combines attention mechanisms with multi-scale feature extraction, achieving 98% detection accuracy.

papers.title: Vision-Language Models for Zero-Shot Industrial Defect Classification
papers.abstract: This paper explores the application of Vision-Language Models (VLMs) for automated optical inspection without task-specific training. We demonstrate zero-shot defect classification achieving 95%+ accuracy across multiple defect categories in PCB manufacturing.

papers.title: LLMOps Best Practices: From Development to Production Deployment
papers.abstract: A comprehensive guide to operationalizing large language models in production environments. Covers prompt versioning, evaluation frameworks, cost optimization strategies, and monitoring best practices.

papers.title: Multi-Camera SLAM for Robotic Manipulation in Dynamic Environments
papers.abstract: We propose a robust SLAM system using multiple synchronized cameras for accurate 3D tracking in cluttered industrial settings. Our approach enables robots to manipulate objects with 95% success rate in dynamic environments.
